ComicInfo.Series: Itty Bitty Hellboy: The Search for the Were-Jaguar
ComicInfo.Summary:
Liz and Hellboy decide they should leave the island before it's too late because of a prophecy that claims that he will bring doom to everyone.
Hellboy gets his hand stuck on a big rock hand sticking out of the ground, but when he tries to escape he releases a horde of zombies from underground.
Abe and Eve like sending messages to the surface in bubbles.
ComicInfo.Tags: Hellboy,Elizabeth Sherman,Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense,Roger,The Lobster
ComicInfo.Teams: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense
